titles.title: a resolution to direct the Senate Legal Counsel to represent an employee of the Senate in the case of United States v. Harold Freidman, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/5/1988--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Mary Robertson, Chief Clerk of the Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations, in the case of United States v. Harold Friedman, et al. Authorizes the Chairman and Ranking Minority Member of the Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations, acting jointly, to provide records of the Subcommittee's investigation, if in their judgment circumstances so warrant.
